title: The Power Is Off in California. Generac Stock Is Soaring.
text:
It’s wildfire season in California. The fire-prone weather prompted Pacific Gas and Electric, which filed for bankruptcy in January to manage the staggering costs of wildfires caused by its equipment, to pull the plug on 750,000 central and northern California customers.

The news of outages sparked a rally in shares of Generac Holdings, which rallied nearly 10% on Wednesday, while the S&P 500 index was up 1.1%. Generac estimates that it sells more than 75% of U.S. residential backup generators, and 25% to 30% of portable...
description: Who says weather emergencies are bad for business?
